entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
